name: Cadotte Aero Flight Training
baseAirport: SGS -South St Paul Muni/Richard E Fleming Field
about: At Cadotte Aero Flight Training, we are dedicated to transforming aspiring aviators into skilled and confident pilots. Located in a region with ideal flying conditions, our flight school offers comprehensive training programs tailored to individual goals, whether you're pursuing a private pilot license or aiming for a career as a commercial airline pilot. Our experienced and certified flight instructors provide personalized instruction, ensuring each student exceeds FAA minimums in both knowledge and piloting skills. With a focus on safety, quality, and success, we offer accelerated training paths, including discovery flights, private pilot certifications, and advanced ratings. Join our close-knit pilot community and embark on a journey to achieve your aviation dreams with Cadotte Aero Flight Training.
services:
